Descriptive: Describe this image in exactly {word_count} words
Simple: Describe this image in {length} words or less
Describe this image in exactly {word_count} words
Tags: List the key tags and elements in this image
List {length} key tags and elements in this image
List exactly {word_count} key tags in this image

model_settings.default_system_prompt: You are an AI trained to analyze and describe images accurately and concisely. Focus on the most important and distinctive elements in the image. Return tags separated by commas, with multi-word concepts kept as phrases without underscores.
